ConnectionStrings._comment: Connection string is built from DB_* environment variables in Program.cs

Jwt._comment: Set JWT_SECRET_KEY, JWT_ISSUER, JWT_AUDIENCE in .env file

Minio._comment: Set MINIO_* environment variables in .env file

OneSignal._comment: Set ONESIGNAL_* environment variables in .env file

Zeptomail._comment: Set ZEPTOMAIL_* environment variables in .env file

Company._comment: Set COMPANY_* environment variables in .env file
